title: Transformers
text:
Understanding Transformers
Transformers revolutionized natural language processing. This tutorial explores attention mechanisms and encoder-decoder structures.

title: AI Tutorials Home
text:
Welcome to AI Tutorials
This site is a collection of interactive, beautiful tutorials on key AI topics, written using Quarto and hosted with GitHub Pages.

title: LSTM Tutorial
text:
Introduction to LSTMs
import torch
import torch.nn as nn

lstm = nn.LSTM(input_size=10, hidden_size=20, num_layers=2)
input = torch.randn(5, 3, 10)
h0 = torch.randn(2, 3, 20)
c0 = torch.randn(2, 3, 20)
output, (hn, cn) = lstm(input, (h0, c0))
output.shape

title: LSTM Tutorial
text:
Introduction to LSTMs
import torch
import torch.nn as nn

lstm = nn.LSTM(input_size=10, hidden_size=20, num_layers=2)
input = torch.randn(5, 3, 10)
